detaileddescription.para: SoMgr error codes
Contains the different error codes for SoMgr component
SoMgr states types for socket
Contains the different states in which a socket can be found
SoMgr control states for socket
Contains the different control states in which a socket can be
Contains the list of all sockets

The socket type indicates that the socket is one of configured socket
range see SOMGR_MAX_NUM_SOCKETS values if the index is out of specified range the socket is invalid context task protection {see shared vars analysis}
Table stores local IP addresses

It is build based on TcpIpLocalAddr list in Tresos
range see SOMGR_LOCAL_ADDR_ID_COUNT values if the index is out of specified range the address is invalid context task protection {see shared vars analysis}

Array to store pbufs that preempted SoMgr_Main_TcpTransmit
range see SOMGR_MAX_SAVED_PREEMPTIONS values N/A context task protection {see shared vars analysis}
